GSD.description:
ALSA: hda: Fix UAF of leds class devs at unbinding

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.22 by commit 0e629052f013eeb61494d4df2f1f647c2a9aef47. For more details please see the references link.
